content: “…someone hands a caveman a PlayStation Vita…” Is there a more random “handheld tech” example you could’ve used? I can only assume you own the Vita, because most people don’t even know wtf a Vita is. I mean, you could have said iPad or smartphone or even GameBoy/DS and it would have been a more mainstream example. Was the Atari Lynx already taken by the Players’ Tribune?
